Test Name: Parathyroid Hormone (PTH) Intact with reflex to PTH Related Peptide (PTHrP)
Purpose: To measure intact parathyroid hormone levels, with reflex testing to PTH-related peptide, to assess parathyroid function and related disorders.
Container: Red-top tube or serum separator tube (SST)
Equipment: Automated immunoassay analyzer (e.g., Roche cobas e411, Abbott Architect i2000)
